import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Home() { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (
{/* Updated main background for Home component if needed, or rely on App.js main bg */} {/* Hero Section */}

{t('home.hero.title')}

{t('home.hero.description')}

{t('home.hero.cta')} {t('Search records')}
{/* Features Section */}

{t('home.features.title')}

{t('home.features.subtitle')}

{t('home.features.description')}

{[ { key: 'easy', icon: ( ), bgColor: 'bg-sky-500' }, { key: 'community', icon: ( ), bgColor: 'bg-emerald-500' }, { key: 'support', icon: ( ), bgColor: 'bg-amber-500' } ].map(({ key, icon, bgColor }, index) => (
{icon}

{t(`home.features.${key}.title`)}

{t(`home.features.${key}.description`)}

{t('home.features.learnMore')}
))}
{/* Call to Action Section */}

{t('home.cta.title')} {t('home.cta.subtitle')}

{t('home.cta.primary')}
{t('home.cta.secondary')}
); } export default Home;
